title: Vaccine Toolbox
cleaned_text:
Modern communication has provided parents to become more informed on the topic of vaccines than ever before. The Vaccine Toolkit is VacTruth’s resource to defend your child and family from those in the medical community not forthcoming with vaccine safety information.

Understand the basics: What are vaccines and why you are being pressured to vaccinate.

Step-by-step guides to help you find relevant information on vaccine ingredients, injuries, etc.

Detailed guides for specific conditions, scenarios, and situations you may encounter as a parent.
